name: Habitat for Humanity Home Supply Store
description: Habitat for Humanity Home Supply Store
hours: Monday: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM Tuesday: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM Wednesday: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM Thursday: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM Friday: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM Saturday: 10:00 AM - 3:00 PM
materials: Construction Materials (Reuse); Gift Bags; Furniture; Household Goods; Office Furniture; Ornaments; Reusable Appliance Donation; Windows; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Computer Peripherals; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
The Habitat Home Supply Store raises funds by selling merchandise and, after expenses, uses all profits to build more homes.  Habitat also provides families an opportunity to buy building materials that they may not otherwise be able to afford. This will help raise the standards of housing. By recycling goods that would have been sent to a landfill, the Habitat Home Supply Store also helps reduce waste disposal costs. If you have materials to donate, please call for more information. The Habitat Home Supply Store takes most materials and the staff will be glad to talk with you.

This site is located in downtown Durango between College and 7th Street.

Aluminum Cans May Be Dropped Off 24 Hours Per Day At The House Shaped Recycle Bin In Front Of The Store
